settings.title: Testing

settings.content:
Need a simple and safe solution to carrying your items with a mobility device?

The New Smart Simple Assist Bag For Your Walker Or Wheelchair.

Gain Back Your Confidence In Day To Day Mobility. Independence, Safety, And Security … Guaranteed!

Learn More

settings.subtitle: Need more stability and safety while using your mobility device?
settings.title: LIMITED TIME - Over 40% OFF Your New Smart Simple Bag For Your Walker Or Wheelchair
settings.text: Gain Back Your Confidence. Independence, Safety, And Security … GUARANTEED!

settings.item_text: Secure + Non-Slip
One Size Fits All Devices
Timeless Style + Multi-Purpose

settings.title: As Seen In:

settings.item_text: Feel more confident and stress-less knowing you'll have everything you need right by your side, without sacrificing safety and security. It's the perfect assistant that helps you speed up recovery times, improve mobility and regain your feeling of independence and renewed dignity.

settings.item_title: Everything You Need, Right By Your Side
settings.item_text: Ever struggle to keep all your essentials next to you on the go? Feeling unprepared stops here. Easily and safely carry around all of your daily essentials, from your phone, magazine, and tablets to any other necessities. Walk outside, to the grocery store or even around the house with more confidence and control.

The Assist Bag can be used on any size walker or wheelchair, ensuring stability and clears all doorways with ease. Designed to be simple and easy to move from one mobility device to the other. It can even be transformed into a shoulder bag for those who use a cane or need their assistant to carry their bag. We focus on functionality first.

settings.title: Why The Assist Bag Is Your New Best Assistant.
ZERO RISK! In-Home FREE 100 Day Trial
settings.text:
Take our bag home today. Try it for 100 days, and in the extremely unlikely event you can't pack everything you need for your daily requirements, or you’re completely unhappy with the bag, send it right back, no questions asked.
We will even cover the return shipping.
This is our way of helping keep you safe and mobile while on the go.

settings.title: 100% Lifetime Secure Guarantee
settings.text:
When you join us at Havanue, you can invest with confidence because you’ll always be covered by our unbelievable lifetime guarantee.
If our bag doesn't hold up through the years, we will give you a completely free replacement bag - no charges and no questions asked.

settings.item_text: Replacing swinging plastic bags and other items with one secured and stable bag helps prevent falls and injuries.
Comes with zipper pockets integrated. We even have zippers within zippers for the special items you need to keeo safe.
Try it at home and feel it for yourself. Love it? Keep it. Don’t love it? We’ll cover the return shipping and 100% money-back.

settings.item_text: We back up our products. If they don’t stand the test of time, then we’ll replace it free of charge.

settings.title: Benefits of Havanue Bags

settings.item_text: Your premium go-to bag for daily living.
This bag is made of a polyester material. Fully lined with a light tan soft polyester.

settings.title: Over 35 years and 1,000s of bags later...The Assist Bag was born.
settings.text:
Designed to help mobility device users that needed something more, and carry less.

My goal when I started Havanue was to bring a stylish, simple, and functional bag to these wonderful humans and to create as much positive impact as possible.
Impacting not just the user’s lives, but their loved ones as well.

settings.title: Our mission is to help enable over 100,000 people in 10 years
settings.text:
I built a program to ensure more people in need receive an Assist Bag. Even those who could not afford it.
That’s why at Havanue a portion of each bag sold goes towards donating a bag to a person in need within the mobility community.

settings.title: See Over 2,000 Loved Ones Use Their Bags All Over The Country

settings.authur_text: “I love that it tastes nice, it is cruelty free, vegan and healthy. I save a fortune on vitamins buying Huel.”
“I’ve dropped 2 sizes and I look and feel so healthy”
“Great go-to for an MRP! Healthy, filling, plant-based and saves a lot of hassle and time.”
“Great go-to for an MRP! Healthy, filling, plant-based and saves a lot of hassle and time.”

settings.title: Listen to 100s of 5 Star Reviews
settings.subtitle: Don’t take our word for it. Here’s what a few of them had to say

settings.item_text: Secure + Non-Slip
One Size Fits All Devices
Timeless Style + Multi-Purpose

settings.title: Over 35 years and 1,000s of bags later...The Assist Bag was born.
settings.text:
Designed to help mobility device users that needed something more, and carry less.

My goal when I started Havanue was to bring a stylish, simple, and functional bag to these wonderful humans and to create as much positive impact as possible.
Impacting not just the user’s lives, but their loved ones as well.

settings.title: Our mission is to help enable over 100,000 people in 10 years
settings.text:
I built a program to ensure more people in need receive an Assist Bag. Even those who could not afford it.
That’s why at Havanue a portion of each bag sold goes towards donating a bag to a person in need within the mobility community.

settings.item_text:
Carry things day-to-day? Our bags are built to stand the test of time, while providing opportunity for you to carry any daily essentials.

Plenty of pockets with plenty of space for things like; tissues, phones, papers, mail, dog leashes, keys, purses and anything you need on your journey. We even included a zipper pocket to keep those valuables safe and secure.

Who says using a walker can't be functional AND stylish... Break the stigma of using a walker and show off your independence with a classy and clean design for men and women.

No more cheesy or cheap bag patterns that scream "hospital gown" from across the room. Get something more sophisticated and timeless instead.

settings.title: Even More Reasons
settings.text: We understand the importance of functionality but also the need for fashion. We've crafted the assist bag to not only look stunning but to work seamlessly in the life of anyone who uses it.

settings.description: On Sale for a limited time only.
On Sale for a limited time only.

settings.title: Prefer our Executive Design?
settings.subtitle: Our more affordable, quilted designs offer the same functionality with softer materials for those looking for a prettier design. Choose between Tan and Floral Design

settings.title: ZERO RISK!  In-Home FREE 100 Day Trial
settings.text:
Take our bag home today. Try it for 100 days, and in the extremely unlikely event you
can t pack everything you need for your daily requirements, or you re completely
unhappy with the bag, send it right back, no questions asked.

We will even cover the return shipping.

This is our way of helping keep you safe and mobile while on the go.

settings.title: The Perfect Gift For Your Loved One.
settings.text:
Unsure if your partner, mother, grandfather, or any loved one
will like our bag?
Buy as a gift with our In Home Free Trial completely risk-free!
Not only is it a gift for your loved one, but also we gift a bag to
someone in need. It s a win for everyone.

settings.title: Lifetime Secure 100% Money-Back Guarantee
settings.text:
When you join us at Havanue, you can invest with confidence because you ll always be
covered by our money back guarantee. In the extremely unlikely event you can t pack
everything you need for your daily requirements, or our bag doesn t hold up over the
next 10 years, we will refund you 100% and even give you a completely free
replacement bag - no charges and no questions asked. This is our way of helping keep
you safe and mobile while on the go

settings.item_text: Replacing swinging plastic bags and other items with one secured and stable bag helps prevent falls and injuries.
Comes with zipper pockets integrated. We even have zippers within zippers for the special items you need to keeo safe.
Try it at home and feel it for yourself. Love it? Keep it. Don’t love it? We’ll cover the return shipping and 100% money-back.
Fits perfectly on walkers, wheelchairs, mobility scooters, and bedside racks.
Everything Assist Bag helps bring more assist bags to those in need but cannot afford.
